name: LittList
description: Et verktøy for å lage litteraturlistegenerator på under 10 sekunder.

scripts.integration-test: npm run-script setup-database-test && npm run-script database-test; # (export TEST=True; node web/server.js & echo "Starting server."; sleep 5; casperjs test test/integration/*.js; kill -9 $!)
scripts.setup-database-test: (export TEST=True; mysql -u $(node -pe 'require("./config.js").database().user') -e "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS $(node -pe 'require("./config.js").database().database'); CREATE DATABASE $(node -pe 'require("./config.js").database().database'); USE $(node -pe 'require("./config.js").database().database'); $(cat database/schema.sql)");
